body: Ok this escalated quickly i don't really mind these types of doujins but the way the story was told it feels like this actually is something that could happen in real life, maybe something like this has already happened i don't know.. it said that they were raped for 10 months and yeah pretty sure that something similar actually happened irl.. good doujin tho it made me feel bad and that means something because i felt something while reading a doujin.. uhh yeah it's pretty good not bad, i fap to it but halfway through i felt bad but i did fap to it..
Yeah, it's the mother's fault at first, but he has crossed the line
Freak?nah you meant legend fucking whores

@NoNut4U The mother was whoring herself out well within possible  view of her daughter. She even brought the guy in without knowing  much about him. The "HURR DURR BAD ECONOMY" thing is bullshit. You can  work it out in ways that aren't throwing your ass at problems and hoping they go away. If the MILF character was single with no children, that'd be different, I'd be hella down,  but as it stands she's as much of a piece of shit as the guy. Only the daughter deserves sympathy, period.

@Reyas, why? For taking out loans she couldn't pay off because of the naturally shit economic system that barely gives enough to live a half-decent life? People living alone themselves find it hard to get by with minimum wage. What more a single mom providing for a daughter who's probably around highschool.
Poor daughter. She didnt deserve that.... the mother though, fuck her she deserves it completely, guy got what he deserved too. Only the daughter deserves sympathy
The post nut clarity hits hard in this type of hentai
I hate myself
NightwalkerJosh same here man i usually read this kind of stuff to escape reality but when I'm done i ask my self how did i end to this

you know i finally figured out i use masturbation, especially fucked up doujins, as a quick escape of real life problems. i was angry today so i used this to self medicate myself. i still don’t feel better so why so i do this? I hope future me reads or remembers this comment or anyone can relate somehow
